name: Monster Munch Halloween Popcorn Mix
author: FOL-14
ingredients: ½ cup candy-coated peanut butter pieces (such as Reese's Pieces®)
1 pound chocolate almond bark (chocolate confectionery coating), broken into chunks
directions: Mix popcorn, candy corn, peanuts, and peanut butter pieces together in a large bowl
Melt the almond bark in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until smooth, 1 to 3 minutes (depending on your microwave)
Do not overheat or chocolate will scorch
Pour melted almond bark over popcorn mixture; stir until popcorn is well coated
Spread popcorn mixture out onto a flat surface lined with waxed paper or parchment
Let dry completely, then break into clumps
